title: Padang Bai Livingseas Coral Restoration (Half-day)
overview: Participate in coral restoration and snorkeling at Livingseas site in Padang Bai.

stops.description: Arrive and learn about coral restoration.
Participate in coral planting and education.
Snorkel around the coral restoration area.

title: Padang Bai Livingseas Coral Restoration Full Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of coral restoration, snorkeling, and marine education at Padang Bai Livingseas site.

stops.description: Arrive and participate in coral restoration.
Engage in coral planting and learn from marine biologists.
Participate in more marine activities and education.
